lenders.name: Tyler
lenders.loan_because: Kiva provides an amzing vehicle to make a differnce in other parts of the world.

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: Investment in human capital is the best investment.
lenders.occupational_info: I trade agricultural commodities, interest rate futures, and equity futures

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I want to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student and I earn money by doing chores, working in the yard, and working for my neighbors.

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: Helping even one person have a better life makes life better for all of us.

lenders.name: Erik & Kim
lenders.loan_because: I was fortunate enough to be born into the right family at the right time in the right place and others are not.  I also feel like our government has so misrepresented our country that it is up to ourselves as individuals to show the true values of most Americans.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach kids the importance of self-expression, the value of seeing things from another's perspective and the importance of working with others towards a common goal.

lenders.name: Evan
lenders.loan_because: "Do all the good you can, by all the means you can, in all the ways you can, in all the places you can, at all the times you can, to all the people you can, as long as ever you can."  -Rev. John Wesley

lenders.name: Arief Budiwidayanto
lenders.loan_because: I simply believe that the world will become a better place if people care for, respect, love, and help each other.

lenders.name: Nick
lenders.loan_because: Hey, Why not?

lenders.name: Greg&Lynn
lenders.loan_because: We are hoping to help others

lenders.name: Kayla  Joiner Foundation
lenders.loan_because:
Kayla was working on a project at school. It was called 
"Pay It Forward". It Read. If someone did you a favor - something big, something you couldn't do on your own and  instead of paying it back, you paid it forward to three people. 

You really can change the world if you care enough.  
Unfortunately, Kayla didn't get to finish her project. But I am going to keep paying it forward for Kayla. I know that is what she would have wanted.  Kayla has the biggest heart and always wanted to help anyone who needed anything.
lenders.occupational_info: Kayla's Family has set up this foundation in Kayla's honor to give scholarships to high school students who demonstrate a sincere will to pursue a pediatric nursing curriculum and can get the most pledges from fellow students to wear their seatbelt.

lenders.name: Carson & Edna
lenders.loan_because: My husband was disabled and lost his job when we still had children at home.  I helped support our family through reselling used clothing and sports equipment.  I inherited money from my sister, and now I am able to help others.

lenders.name: Douglas
lenders.loan_because: I can.  We are all here to make the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a teacher in San Diego who is taking a year off to work towards my masters degree in education.

lenders.name: MakeMyGraphic
lenders.loan_because: I am a small business too.

lenders.name: Kate
lenders.loan_because: together we can make a difference  bzzzbee@live.com

lenders.name: Tigger
lenders.loan_because:
Its a way to improve lives from the ground up. 
I can re-cycle my money to make it help more people.
lenders.occupational_info: I make websites work better

lenders.name: Nigel
lenders.loan_because: I'm lucky enough to be able to do so, and the money goes direct to someone who needs it with no overheads. I particularly like being able to lend the same $ multiple times.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with the management of large US companies.

lenders.name: Caroline & Ciarán
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to make their lives more comfortable for themselves and for their families.
lenders.occupational_info: Ciaran is a professor of the science of sport and Caroline is a salesperson at a bank that lends money to companies trading between China and the US.

lenders.name: Shuxin
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I love to help mothers who are doing their best to look after the family and raise their children.

lenders.name: César-Mario
lenders.loan_because: It is an efficient and durable way to enable people to improve their lives.

lenders.name: Jay & Claire
lenders.loan_because: The hardest part of  starting or expanding a business is the cash-squeeze upfront. Even more so in poorer countries. By lending through Kiva we're sponsoring the borrower to improve the lives of everyone in the community around them, as the borrower may offer goods or services previously unavailable in the community, and sometimes the borrower's business may employ others as well, providing money and work experience.
lenders.occupational_info:
Jay writes about how to use software.
Claire designs web sites.

lenders.name: Hanni
lenders.loan_because: If women around the World are to be free, they have to be able to support themselves. In this way I can help sisters around the globe take the first fragile steps toward freedom.

lenders.name: pascal
lenders.loan_because:
a) it's  good , great  feeling to help people  who  deserve  it 
b) I  know  from my own  experience  that such small  credits can have a big impact
c) kiva  is efficent  & transparent
lenders.occupational_info: happy entrepreneur  in  various international agriculture or food  related activities

lenders.name: Saqib
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance and a dream.

lenders.name: abdoulie
lenders.loan_because: I want upgrade my career as a technician on electronics
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a technician i do repair tv,radio,photocopiers,printers, and so many things about electronics, i really like y work.

lenders.name: Christian
lenders.loan_because: to help people improve their everyday life...

lenders.name: Jonathan and Rachel

lenders.occupational_info: Jon is a High School science teacher.  Rachel is a stay-at-home mum.

lenders.name: Simon
lenders.loan_because: there is every reason to do so.

lenders.occupational_info: I work at the  Helsinki University Hospital in Helsinki,  Finland. As a midwife I deliver babies and take care of mothers and babies after the delivery, teaching the new parents how to take care of their baby.

lenders.loan_because: it's a great approach for fear sharing
lenders.occupational_info: i create digital tools & music for consciousness development, visit my website for complete info.

lenders.name: ann janssen
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people in other countries, something small for us means a lot for them
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of children from 3 months  up to 3 years old. they come to me during the day while their parents go to their job

lenders.name: Kenneth
lenders.loan_because: I belive in good things, and doing good things will create even more positive things, as well  for the target as the one who does the right things!
lenders.occupational_info: Iam working with transportation of goods in containers

lenders.name: Gail
lenders.loan_because: I want to be able to make a difference, even if it's just in a small way. I love Kiva because it allows people to each add their small amounts together to help someone who is working to help themselves and their community.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a primary school teacher. I love what I do!

lenders.loan_because: I have been so lucky in my life. I try to make a difference in the world. This is a great way to help people who need a hand up.
lenders.occupational_info: My law practice is employment law, primarily representing employees. My first book, "The Writer's Guide to the Courtroom" will be released by Behler Publications in November 2009. I am an aspiring writer of children's books.

lenders.loan_because: We like to make connections with people all over the world, and help out however we can.

lenders.loan_because: I don't have enough money to build my business
lenders.occupational_info: small store of people basic needs such as food. I don't have enough money to made that business survive. So I need help from another to keep its stay and become survived.

lenders.name: Mirka
lenders.loan_because: I think we need to help those who are not as privileged. This is a great way!

I think it simply can help people alot...

lenders.occupational_info: Jack of all trades

lenders.occupational_info: I taught English to new immigrants to Canda. One year I taught English in Bolivia.

lenders.loan_because: It's GREAT !

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: It's an quick and easy way to make an impact on people's lives.

lenders.name: ACIM-St. Pete, FL
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we love.

lenders.name: Kwanzaa Bunch
lenders.loan_because: it is important to share what you have with others.  It is a blessing to be able to assist people who are striving to improve the quality of their lives and the lives of their families just like we are.
lenders.occupational_info: This donation is the result of a small collection from individual family members during a Kwanzaa celebration who came up with the idea to contribute to Kiva in order to share the principle of  Ujamaa (Cooperative Economics) which is to build and maintain our own stores, shops and other businesses and to profit from them together.

lenders.name: Sol
lenders.loan_because:
We all need a helping hand sometimes!
;-)

lenders.name: Leo
lenders.loan_because: I believe that growing the economy from the bottom is one of the most efficient way of fighting poverty and create a more equitable and sustainable world

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.occupational_info: Bloomfield, Ontario, Canada

lenders.name: Madrid
lenders.occupation: Sr. Acct. Exec. Legal Document Services

lenders.name: Cristo Rey St. Martin College Prep
Shawn
lenders.loan_because: It's a great opportunity for me to use some of my good fortune to help others in a positive way.

lenders.name: Ron
lenders.loan_because: as an independent small business I understand the need for sufficient capital to finance my guitar making. If I can help someone realize this need for themselves and help them succeed, I am happy.
lenders.occupational_info: I hand build acoustic guitars and other fretted instruments.

lenders.name: Bradley
lenders.loan_because:
I've become addicted to profile-reading on Kiva. 

When I was a kid, I lived in the (developing)  world. As a young-adult, my single-mom worked long hours to put me through school.  When I read Kiva profiles, it reminds me of how small the world is: everyone on planet earth seems to have the same hopes for themselves and their families... Plus, the creativity and practicality that people here show in their business planning is amazing.
lenders.occupational_info:
I came here to Italy +4 years ago... to train for running (track & field) and work part-time.

I also expect to start an Italian master's degree in 2008, which is lucky, because university in the USA is very expensive!

So, it seems that with hard work and a little luck things seem to be going well for me.  I don't make a lot of money, but  I'd like to commit to donating to Kiva at least 4 times per year, and see if the same combination of hard work and luck will work for others!

lenders.name: Jeff and Amy
lenders.loan_because: I've seen what it can do in people's lives and it's amazing.

lenders.name: Aaron
lenders.loan_because: the world's gonna end

lenders.name: james
lenders.loan_because: It is good to give back to enable others to succeed
lenders.occupational_info: I advise companies and governments about future trends like technology

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I want to support the global entrepreneurial spirit.
lenders.occupational_info: Director of a High School with an emphasis on Music and Art.

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: I am in an entrepreneurial class and I think Kiva is a good organization.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student and an artist.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference to improve people's lives, and I find kiva's concept to be one of the most constructive and effective one.

lenders.occupational_info: I care for children who cannot live with their families for some reason. I also teach Te Reo Māori at a local primary school

lenders.name: Beverly

lenders.occupational_info: My husband and I design clever ways to help people learn how to be better at their jobs.

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.loan_because: I believe that by helping a little, we all benefit.

lenders.name: Andrew

lenders.loan_because: I think all people need sometimes is a chance to try.

lenders.name: Cori-Ann

lenders.name: James Darling
lenders.loan_because: This is far more profitable than my bank
lenders.occupational_info: I create computer software that helps cities recover from disasters.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: Each of us has the responsibility to better another person's life--through our thoughts, our time, or our money.  I believe in the power of micro-enterprise development and how it can positively impact a life.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with low-income families through a non-profit organization that helps people start small businesses in Minnesota (one of the coldest states in the USA).

lenders.name: Mary Ann
lenders.loan_because:
I find it amazing and gratifying that I can help
others with, what in the US, are small amounts of money  but can make a big difference in peoples' lives. These loans make me feel that I am directly helping specific people. It's great for all of us!
lenders.occupational_info:
My work now that I am retired is to help in my
community by giving of my time for free. I give my time at a local arboretum by keeping the library open and helping this organization to raise money.

lenders.name: Henrik D
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people to improve their lives through their own active participation by offering them financial opportunities through loan programs and not just by giving without aim or purpose.

lenders.name: albert
lenders.loan_because: I want to see my loans make a difference in people's lives and allow people to help themselves.

lenders.name: Luis
lenders.loan_because: I realized that instead of buying a new pair of pants or a shirt that I don't need, I can positively change the life of one person and his/her family. It's one of many ways of contributing for a better world.

lenders.name: isabel
lenders.loan_because:
i think that sharing is a good idea to change the world
And we must change it
This is a good way to start
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a public hospital, in the outpatient clinic, the noninvasive exams department and the emergency room

lenders.name: Leslie
lenders.loan_because: I love to travel and explore all the wonderful places and people this world has to offer. Everyone deserves a chance.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people with disabilities live in the community.

lenders.name: Luis
lenders.loan_because: God gives me a happy life. So I need to help others, a way to say thank you,my God!

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: To be able to touch someone's life around the world - that's amazing!
lenders.occupational_info: Find new ways of extracting metal from ores.

lenders.name: Cynthia and Max
lenders.loan_because: I believe that the biggest changes come from many people taking small steps to make the world a better place.  I am blessed with opportunities and hope to share these gifts with others.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a firefighter in a big city.  My job is to put out the fires, as well as help people who are sick or injured.  I love my work!

lenders.name: Drucilla
lenders.loan_because: It's so easy.  And you feel like you are truly doing something that might possibly change someone's life.  Isn't that what it is all about? And what we want in our own lives?

lenders.name: Duane and Maureen
lenders.loan_because: it's so awesome that such a small amount of money changes lives in a very powerful way.
lenders.occupational_info: We are both in the business world, so we are drawn toward these small business owners!  The challenges they face are much more difficult than anything we have ever been through.

lenders.name: ccyl
lenders.loan_because: "If you can't do something smart, do something right."  This is both.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people tell the US government that we want to end poverty at home and abroad.  I help others learn how they can help fight hunger and the worst aspects of poverty.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: Small efforts can have a big impact for others.

lenders.name: Anna
lenders.loan_because: it's exciting and rewarding to be a small part of giving someone in another country the opportunity to start and/or enhance their own business.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a large law firm in Silicon Valley in the Intellectual Property Department.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: It helps improve the world just a little bit at a time.

lenders.name: Seth

lenders.occupational_info: I count money.

lenders.name: Bob
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world.

lenders.name: Melanie
lenders.loan_because: Luke 12:48 - From everyone who has been given much, much will be required, and from the one who has been entrusted with much, even more will be asked.

lenders.loan_because: it makes me feel good to be able to help people improve their livelihoods and better provide for their families.

lenders.name: Alizabeth
lenders.loan_because: my mother taught me the importance of giving back when I was young.

lenders.name: Jan
lenders.loan_because: Many years ago, with a $500 bank loan I started a business that grew steadily, did good work, and -- most important to me -- created jobs. It was the most challenging and rewarding venture of my life (short of childraising). I want others to have that opportunity.
lenders.occupational_info: Former business owner, now disabled/retired.

I do this in honor of all the people who have inspired me along the way....

lenders.occupational_info: I am an economics major in my senior year of college.

lenders.name: Frances
lenders.loan_because: I can and I believe--in the dignity of work and supporting people's dreams for a better tomorrow if they're just given an opportunity

lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student studying International Relations at Seattle Pacific University.

lenders.name: Marie-Line
lenders.loan_because: I am so lucky to got all these chances in my life that I want to return something to other people. I wish everyone was as lucky as me.

lenders.name: Scott Keefer
lenders.loan_because: I want to assist people in other parts of the world in a real and meaningful way.  I make a donation to A Clear Direction's KIVA portfolio each time a client has referred us to someone who takes up our services.  KIVA's philosophy sits well with my business as it is engaging in investments that are improving real lives for the better.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide independent financial advice to clients including - Financial Planning Strategy, Investment, Life Insurances, Superannuation and Retirement Planning, Debt Reduction and Cash Flow Management.

lenders.name: Mia & Jesper
lenders.loan_because: We believe this is the best way to help

lenders.name: Beatrice and Luc
lenders.loan_because:
Life is easier for some of us and a lot more difficult for others. Nevertheless we cannot help everybody. But there are 2 proverbs we'd like to share.

This one about the sea stars, when someone on the beach seeing all these sea stars drying and wondering what difference would it make to put one back in the water when there are so many dying. Looking at the one he had in his hand he thought : at least it will make a difference for this one.

And the other proverb says that it is better to learn fishing than to give fish to someone, for evident reasons....

Kiva is just all of this. Simply BRILLIANT!!!
lenders.occupational_info: We work for econology (Ecology at good price)  and we love it !!!!!

lenders.name: Pedro Silva
lenders.loan_because: Generosity consists in giving before beeing asked

lenders.name: Pat C.
lenders.loan_because: microloans make the most sense for the most people, a way for each of us to help everyone of us.
lenders.occupational_info: a small business owner who, if less fortunate, might be on the receiving end of Kiva

lenders.whereabouts: Vila Nova de Gaia Vila Nova de Gaia

lenders.name: Wendell & Chris

lenders.occupational_info: Chris-I help teachers teach and students learn with library resources and computers

and mirco loans empower!
this is just the charity I have been looking for!
Thank you Kiva!! :)

Plus my dad is big on eating so what better to support than a bakery:)

lenders.name: Jon
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the unity of mankind and the dignity of work done in the spirit of service. By loaning through Kiva, I hope to promote those ideals, in a small way.

Indigos are spiritually advanced people who often feel they don't fit in and may seem rebellious, but are truly remarkable people that will thrive if they are supported. I also do psychic readings and energy healing (Shamballa Reiki). My most important work, however, is being a mom to my son who was born this past year.

lenders.name: I Team Students
lenders.loan_because: We are very proud that the World Food Prize is held every year in Des Moines Iowa!  As part of learning about one of the previous World Food Prize laureates (later named 2006 Nobel Peace Prize recipient!)we watched a video called Pennies a Day (Izzit.org) which described the impact microloans can have on the lives of people in need.  We had a "Penny War" contest between classes and raised $150.00 to fund 6 $25.00 microloans.
lenders.occupational_info: We are Iowa junior high students who are learning that we can do community service globally as well as locally through organizations like Kiva!
